name: GARNOUILLE MUST LIVE!
description:
Help Garnouille to find an exit.
In a magical world full of dangers, Garnouille, an intrepid frog, embarks on a quest to save his habitat from imminent destruction. To do this, Garnouille must navigate through levels riddled with deadly traps using his special “dash” ability.
The player must guide Garnouille through a series of platforming levels, using precise jumps and strategic dashes to avoid traps and save his habitat.
